channel.title: [PI] If Has 200m Exp....[PI]
channel.description:
How do I make it so if someone gains 200m exp, you earn a point?
[code]if blahblahblah 200m exp gained method (level up playerassistant?) c.proPoint += 1;[/code]

item.title: [PI] If Has 200m Exp....[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:4, topic:397645”][quote author=zattion link=topic=494784.msg3617308#msg3617308 date=1307083103]

if (c.playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) { c.proPoint += 1; }

add under addskillexp method in playerassistant.java
[/quote]
I just want it to add it the one time they achieve it, not everytime they go above 200m exp.

expain it more do you mean from like attacking something for max exp or just enter a code to have 200m exp i can do either pm

if a player achieves 200m exp, I want it to give them a proPoint[/quote]

The max EXP is 200M, you can’t go any higher. Let me explain this code to you:

That means if the players skill is at 200M EXP

That’s adding the 1 point if the player does have 200M EXP.

So it will, as you wanted, add only 1 point at 200M EXP and you can’t get any higher.

Read full topic
